Within the walls of Sao Jorge Castle stands the noble Solar Do Castelo with two floors and anattic. Solar Do Castelo is also known as the Kitchens Mansion as it is constructed where the old kitchens of Alcaova Palace once stood. This XVIII Century Palace which is classified as an historic building has several medieval remains which likely belonged to outbuildings of the Palace an example of which is the cistern trafic access to our place is restricted to locals and taxis 24h a day.

Feel the inspiring bohemian spirit of the Portuguese capital when you stay at the Vincci Baixa an exclusive four-star hotel in the centre of Lisbon featuring a unique design. The combination of contemporary styles and touches of classicism and modernism makes this hotel in the Baixa neighbourhood in Lisbon a very special place where you can really immerse yourself in the lifestyle of this adorable city.Vincci Hoteles selected among the 101 business examples of actions PorElClima 2019. Specifically its plan for the elimination of chemical products throughout the chain has been chosen among the more than 190 applications submitted to be part of this project proposed by the Community PorElClima nationwide.A plan that seeks to recognize the work of companies that have implemented actions to take care of their environment and deal with climate change as well as publicize the actions presented by each entity to inspire other companies and individuals.One of the certifications Vincci hoteles has is the international certification ISO 14001 for environmental management system.

In the heart of Lisboa and ideally located aside the walls of St. Jorge Castle, the Olissipo Hotel affords one of the most impressive panoramic views of Lisbon.   The hotel is located in the famous Bairro do Castelo, between the well-known Mouraria and Alfama quarters- it is also the perfect starting place to discover the Patron Saints festivities that occurs every June.   This very special hotel combines the familiar atmosphere with the most modern technology and above all luxurious facilities and exceptional service together with traditional art of Portuguese hospitality.

Welcome to Palacio Belmonte. Lisbon oldest and most storied palace. Palacio Belmonte was lovingly restored by Frederic Coustols and his wife Maria in 1994. From ruins to the highest standards of construction. The Coustols painstakingly incorporated traditional techniques to maintain the beauty and grandeur of the property original state.For one year. Frederic stayed in the hollowed out ruins of the former noble home in order to fully comprehend the construction and landscape of the property. Holes in the ceilings. devoid of windows and doors. the project gradually began to take a life of its own.It was during this first year that the Palacio became the scene of two acclaimed films. one by Wim Wenders. Lisbon Story. The second film titled Afira Pereira by Antonio Tabucchi. Which made full use of the holes in the roof and rain catching buckets to create a truly memorable scene. Facing countless obstacles and seemingly insurmountable challenges. The Palacio was finally complete and the iconic large red doors were opened to the public in the year 2000.Much more than a hotel. the Palacio is a guesthouse and sanctuary for the creative and inquisitive. A place to find peace within our magnificent city. High above the historic district of Alfama. Palacio Belmonte lies just beneath the famous Sao Jorge Castelo. For over 2000 years. Palacio Belmonte has shared a history with the castelo and has  witnessed many of the most pivotal events of Lisbon storied past.360 windows and 360 degree views. each view is a lense on the old world. Within our walls you will discover tranquil terraces. natural gardens. and peaceful patios. We welcome you to unlock your own experience timeless. unforgettable and entirely your own.
Concept Suite Fernao Mendes Pinto

The NH Collection Lisboa Liberdade an elegant and newly renovated hotel is directly situated on Avenida de Liberdade. Conveniently located in the Tivoli Forum area Lisbon Airport is just 5 km away. For guests seeking local tourist attractions Sao Jorge Castle is only 2 km away while the Chiado Museum and the Santa Maria Maior de Lisboa cathedral are a short walk from NH Collection Lisboa Liberdade. The 83 modern rooms decorated with bright colors and hardwood floors feature luxurious mattresses and a choice of pillows. Some rooms offer amazing views of the Sao Jorge Castle and the Tagus River. Guests can enjoy a healthy and balanced breakfast buffet including fruits yogurts and breads. The hotel s Restaurante Do Teatro offers a selection of international local and Mediterranean cuisine and a cozy lobby bar invites guests to cocktails wine and light meals. For a panoramic view during the warmer season the Atico by NH bar is located on the 11th floor and has a rooftop pool with lounge chairs towels and a bar that serves drinks and light meals. The hotel s multi-function room can accommodate up to 40 people and is fully equipped for business events as well as private parties.

Terraco Restaurant is currently closed for renovation and will re-open  October, 31st 2018. The SKYBAR, located in the hotel Rooftop, will remain  open and fully operational.   Shop until you drop on Lisbons prime fashion boulevard, Avenida da  Liberdade, where the hotel is located. Stroll along elegant architecture  and picturesque shopfronts, stopping off at cosy sidewalk cafes. Our rooms are outfitted for urban luxury, from elegant furnishings to  spacious layouts. Relax with essential modern amenities, most importantly  a comfy bed dressed in the softest linens. Wining and dining is our passion. Discover gourmet ingenuity at Terraco,  our rooftop restaurant boasting stunning city views. Cervejaria Liberdade  is the latest greatest seafood hotspot. Introducing Lisbons favourite  rooftop bar. Located on the top floor, Sky Bar is known for the best city  panoramas and superb cocktails. Sip an icy mojito and relax in  sophistication. Now open year-round with a covered area, come enjoy live  music, DJs and funky events. Tivoli Spa is a timeless, refined and elegant experience focused on  balanced healing. Seek harmony with a sense of glamour, decompressing in  peacefulness and fine wellbeing. Innovate techniques are combined with  holistic therapies in rejuvenating treatments and expert massages. Leave  stress and bodily tensions behind through highly sensory escapes. Train hard or start slow. Exercise at your own pace with Tivoli Shape.  Our fully equipped fitness centre is designed to help guests find their  perfect fit. Our swimming pool is a slice of paradise in the heart of the city. Swim a  few laps surrounded by semi-tropical garden. Seek shade beneath a  towering rubber tree. Spend days lounging in unforgettable bliss. Our conference centre's 14 meeting rooms are spacious, flexible and can  host up to 280 guests. Our technicians, connectivity, bandwidth and  state-of-the-art equipment ensure seamless experiences.

The Eurostars Das Letras***** offers to its guests an amazing mixture of luxury, natural materials and design, crowned with a very special detail. Words as an art form are the main feature in this hotel. Its spaces are splashed with world classic literary references. An exclusive atmosphere also found in the hotel restaurant, with a terrace, or at the fitness centre and sauna. The hotel also has a complete offer in meeting rooms with facilities carefully designed to meet all your needs. Each one of the 107 rooms of Eurostars Das Letras invites you to dive into a literary atmosphere and enjoy works fragments of the most representative writers from the universal literature, starting with Miguel de Cervantes, William Shakespeare, following with Calderón de la Barca, José Saramago and finishing with Cicerón or Jorge Manrique among others. Notice: Free Wi-Fi everywhere in the hotel.

The Hotel Altis, five star Conference & Business Hotel, combines elegance, sophistication and comfort with the best location in Lisbon’s city centre. Recently renovated the hotel has 300 bedrooms and suites, including the brand new deluxe rooms, with great views over the cultural and historical quarters, Internet access, Full HD LCD TV and mini-bar, a fully equipped business centre and 18 multipurpose meeting spaces with capacity from 8 up to 750 people, suitable for the most demanding events. There is also a covered heated swimming pool, fitness room and 3 bars giving guests the chance to unwind. To enjoy the Portuguese excellent cuisine, there`s a panoramic restaurant on the top floor - the D. Fernando Grill, for a casual meal the coffee-shop in the lobby or for a private group meal the Girassol restaurant. A complimentary shuttle service is also available between the Altis Hotels and the airport. Hotel Altis is member of the Luxury collection of Great Hotels of the World.

Porto bay Liberdade is the Porto bay groups new five-star hotel in Lisbon. Located in the heart of the Portuguese capital next to Avenida Da Liberdade on Rua Rosa Araujo the design of architect Fredericovalsassina preserves the historical facade of the early 20th century Lisbon manor in a dialogue between the old and the contemporary. The environment and decor evoke details from the past with the constant elements of old wood and marble.This charming boutique hotel with features of a resort in an urban setting offers comfort timelessness hospitality and the well-known service of Porto bay hotels and resorts. A bright spotlight joining the spectacular well-known natural city lights of Lisbon.

An ideal hotel for a getaway to Lisbon as a couple with friends or family on a business trip or city break.Vincci Hoteles selected among the 101 business examples of actions PorElClima 2019. Specifically its plan for the elimination of chemical products throughout the chain has been chosen among the more than 190 applications submitted to be part of this project proposed by the Community PorElClima nationwide.A plan that seeks to recognize the work of companies that have implemented actions to take care of their environment and deal with climate change as well as publicize the actions presented by each entity to inspire other companies and individuals.One of the certifications Vincci hoteles has is the international certification ISO 14001 for environmental management system.

Find all of the defining characteristics of Lisbon  charm, intimacy, glamour, and a sense of classic cinema  exemplified in Hotel Florida. Located in the heart of the city, this recently renovated Lisbon boutique hotel affords exceptional convenience to major business, shops, cultural sites, and rich nightlife. Take advantage of the prime setting of this downtown Lisbon design hotel, positioned directly in front of Marques de Pombal Underground Station, which connects with all major transportation in the area.The Hotel Florida provides 72 fully renovated guestrooms filled with a sense of classic cinema and a touch of glamour. Offering family rooms, connected rooms, rooms with terraces, and junior suites, the Hotel Florida is ideal for a different stay in the beautiful city of Lisbon. In-room amenities include LCD flat-screen TV, satellite or cable TV, WiFi access, telephone, and safe.

The Eurostars Lisboa Parque is a new and modern Hotel, which in 2013 was renovated  in order to offer the best service and quality. It is situated in one of the most commercial districts of Lisbon, next to the Parque Eduardo VII de Inglaterra and the Avenida Liberdade. The hotel is in a remodeled part of the Palace Sottomayor. The hotel, which has been decorated with care and using superior materials, has 83 wide rooms that offer all the services of an urban 4-stars-hotel. The hotel also has two meeting rooms with capacity for 60 people. The Eurostars Lisboa Parque is located in a perfect place, near the Public transport facilities. It is perfect for business trips and also for guests who love shopping and city parks. There is also free Wi-Fi and a Gym. From the hotel many known places are easy to reach: Praça Marques de Pombal, the Avenida Liberdade, la Baixa, Rossio or the Praça do Comércio.

BEST AVAILABLE RATE
TWIN OR DOUBLE ONLY BED

This environmental-friendly hotel in Lisbon offers modern accommodations with low-consumption air conditioning and a satellite LCD TV. Picoas Metro Station is an 8-minute walk away.Including free Wi-Fi, the classic rooms and suites at Neya Lisboa Eco Hotel come with a spacious bathroom and a minibar. Low energy light bulbs and high-quality thermal and acoustic isolation are standard in each.A breakfast buffet is available daily in the Viva Lisboa! restaurant with its large, factory-style lamps. Healthy Mediterranean dishes based on fairtrade products are served for lunch and dinner at The Neya.The hot tub and fitness centre offer guest the opportunity to enjoy a quiet afternoon for themselves. Various massages and natural beauty treatments are available as well.The 24-hour reception staff provides a car rental service. Marques de Pombal Square and the beginning of Avenida da Liberdade are a 15-minute walk away from the hotel.

Located in front of Edward VII Park and the Marques de Pombal Square, this hotel has an excellent location at just 4 metro stops from the old town of Lisbon.Nothing is better than to take a break in a spacious and friendly atmosphere after visiting the city.In the morning get ready to taste our delicious breakfast buffet and let yourself surrounded by the charms of a wonderful city.We are settled between three metro stations: Picoas, Marquês de Pombal and Parque; close to Edward VII Park, The Corte Ingles and the bus stop n. 91. Right in the city, at less than 2 minutes from a metro stop, we offer to our clients an easy access to any side of Lisbon. **Pets permitted with an extra charge of 15eur/night.

Hotel da Estrela is a small boutique hotel situated in the heart of historic Lisbon. Comprising a selection of just 19 rooms and suites the space is totally original- bespoke- comfortable and intimate. All the interiors were decorated by Miguel Cancio Martins - Buddha Bar Paris- Pacha Marrakech - and are designed to evoke the spirit of a classic old style school offering a unique approach to the hotel experience. The rooms and suites of Hotel da Estrela offer magnificent views across the city and the river Tagus. All of our rooms are spacious and comfortable. The restaurant- Cantina da Estrela is a neighbourhood restaurant- serving authentic food of Mediterranean feel made every day with the freshest ingredients from the local markets. Walk 200 metres and you will find Campo de Ourique with its traditional Portuguese shops or the iconic park and formal gardens of Estrela Basilica. Less than 10 minutes away you will also find the neighbourhoods of Chiado- Principe Real- Avenida da Liberdade- Santos and Baixa- Bairro Alto and Docas.  Hotel da Estrela is a Small Luxury Hotels of the World property.

hotel.name: DoubleTree by Hilton Lisbon - Fontana Park

description.text: Due to the current travel environment, this hotel is currently not accepting guests for a short period. Reservations are available for future dates. Please see below for up-to-date policy information and ways to contact Hilton Guest Assistance. We look forward to welcoming you to the hotel soon.Discover the unique design of the DoubleTree by Hilton Lisbon - Fontana Park. Created from Lisbon's 20th-century metallurgical factory, our hotel features original details combined with contemporary geometry. The striking design and relaxing waterfall cascade in our outdoor Winter Garden have earned us several accolades in Design and Decoration since 2008. This cozy area has the perfect environment to relax at any time of the day. Enjoy your meal in a setting of trees that will take you to exotic, faraway places.  Meet with friends or colleagues to enjoy cocktails and relaxing music played by DJs at Fontana Bar & Lounge. Visit our fashionable bar on Thursdays and enjoy a drink while filling your soul with the warm rhythms of our Jazz Sessions. Dine in style at our restaurant Saldanha Mar, where our Chef has created a tempting Portuguese and Mediterranean-style menu, showcasing the finest fish and seafood flavors.  Relax in contemporary spacious accommodations at DoubleTree by Hilton. Choose from our stylish guest rooms, family rooms or suites, featuring an array of amenities to make you feel at home. Enjoy a drink from the minibar as you watch movies on the TV, soak in the bathtub or work at the large desk with WiFi. Upgrade to an expansive suite for superior views about Lisbon.  Celebrate or hold a meeting for up to 400 people at this Lisbon hotel with 7 flexible meeting spaces, all with the latest A/V equipment and direct access to the hotel's interior car park. Modern, innovative and cosmopolitan, the DoubleTree by Hilton Lisbon - Fontana Park offers you a privileged location in one of the main business centers of Lisbon. The hotel is located in the heart of the city, close to the historical center and the main attractions of the Portuguese capital as well as shopping areas. This Design Hotel is near fantastic beaches, golf courses and the Lisbon International Airport.  Regardless of the purpose of your stay, you will always be welcomed with warm Portuguese hospitality and a DoubleTree signature, warm welcome cookie.

DREAM AWAY

This house is believed to have been inspiration for the famous novel Os Maias written by Ea de Queiroz,a Portuguese writer who is said to have lived here. Welcome to the InterContinental Lisbon, a new addition within the InterContinental family. We invite you to come and visit this warm respite in the centre of this dynamic city. Just a minute from Marques de Pombal square, nestled between Park Eduardo VII and Av. da Liberdade, this 331 room fresh hotel with its expansive view is the ideal choice for business or leisure. The InterContinental Lisbon team will combine all its efforts in order to make your customer stay a unique experience. The Hotel features a Club InterContinental, an exclusive private lounge and its related benefits from breakfast in the morning to cocktails in the evening. Savour a gourmet experience at the restaurant Akla offering a natural approach to food where the market flavours shine. The InterContinental Lisbon is also appreciated as a first class venue for business conferences and memorable corporate incentives.

At Sheraton Lisboa Hotel & Spa, you're at the very center of all Lisbon has to offer. Take advantage of our central city location in the gorgeous ancient capital of Portugal, with unbeatable access to the city's finest dining, cultural and historic attractions. Relax in our comfortable, modern hotel accommodations, with luxurious bedding, marble bathrooms and a full in-room entertainment package. Experience the city's food scene with our in-house dining options, including Portuguese-style tapas and local dishes, or drop by our rooftop bar to enjoy a classic cocktail and gaze out at the Lisbon waterfront. Refresh your senses with a swim in our elegant outdoor pool or a pampering visit to our day spa. Ready to venture out from the hotel? You'll love our easy access to the city center by car, by metro, and on foot. Our hotel location also makes it ideal for hosting your business meeting or conference in Lisbon - explore our flexible, 13,000-square-foot event space. Reserve your room in the heart of Lisbon today.

description.text: A true oasis in the centre of Lisbon, the Olissippo Lapa Palace formly  known as, Lapa Palace, was originally a 19th century aristocratic villa  located in the elegant embassy district of Lisbon just a short taxi  ride 5 minutes from the central shopping area of the city.  It boasts beautiful landscaped gardens with streams and waterfalls and  a heated outdoor swimming pool.  All helping to create a cool and shady  retreat in Lisbon.  The hotel is made up of 3 wings over 7 floors and is built partly into  a hillside  which means that many of the large and elegantly furnished  rooms and suites can offer terraces with beautiful views over the  gardens and the city.  A resort within the city. Large rooms -min. 42 sq.mt- most with  spectacular views overlooking the gardens pool city and river. Spa and  outdoor heated swimming pool.  Since Jan 01st 2008, Olissippo Lapa Palace is a Non-smoking Hotel. It  is not possible for guests to smoke in their rooms, however they are  able to smoke on the balconies.  National Tourism Registration Number - Nr 0057

Located in the centre of Lisbon the Lisbon Real Palacio Hotel was recovered from the former Guedes Quinhones Palace dating back to the 17th century.With a total of 147 rooms the Lisbon Real Palacio Hotel is the end result of a perfect symmetry between classical and contemporary styles lending it an enchanting story. Go back in time and visit one of the 12 rooms that are part of the ancient Mansion.Because flavours are also travelling companions. We invite you the Guarda Real Bar and Restaurant where we added a touch of creativity to traditional Portuguese cuisine.After a long journey enjoy a massage in the Health Club and recover your strength to plunge into a new story that is yet to be told.Hold your event in one of the 5 event rooms which can hold up to 230 people and this will be a landmark in the life of your guests.Discover the charms of the Portuguese capital and enjoy a personalized service that will make your stay remarkable. For further information on Lisbon see Visit Lisbon.Covid-19 Prevention PlanThe safety and well-being of our guests and staff are our top priority - so we are taking maximum precautions in all our hotels following the recommendations of WHO and local health authorities.New procedures have been implemented to prevent the spread of the virus when cleaning our rooms and all public spaces; our teams are prepared to achieve the highest standards of cleaning and disinfection; and we temporarily suspended the operation of entertainment services such as spas and pools. There may also be situations of limitated circulation in some areas to ensure the necesssary social distance as well as the suspension of certain restaurant and bar services. Visit our website to see the Contingency Plan in place.
